original_title: ネプチューン　ｉｎ　どつきどつかれ
overview: A gang of tough youths, who have little interest in finding work, while away their days with quarrels and girls in their Kishiwada neighborhood. Based on the novel by Toshikazu Nakaba, who also wrote "The Easy Life". Starring the popular comic trio, "Neptune."
title: Getting Even With Bad Boys
